com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom.samples

Class SimpleMailStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom.samples.SimpleMailStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailStorage

    public class SimpleMailStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements MailStorage
    A simple implementation of a Mail room storage unit, hides any internal implementation of data structures used and allows you to store items in known box IDs or retrieve whole boxes. Has a fixed storage box size.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SimpleMailStorage(int maxBoxes, int boxSize)
      Generate a new SimpleMailStorage unit with a limit on number of boxes

      Retrieves a box by identifier for delivery by delivery bot.

      Check if the storage unit is empty
      boolean isFull()
      Check if the storage unit is full of storage boxes
      StorageBox retrieveBox(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieve a storage box from the storage system by ID
      StorageBox.Summary[] retrieveSummaries()
      Retrieve an array of all Storage Boxes currently stored within this mail system, including their maximum size, percentage full, number of floors to deliver to and identifier.

        Returns:
        a new storage box
        Throws:

      • retrieveSummaries

        public StorageBox.Summary[] retrieveSummaries()
        Description copied from interface: MailStorage
        Retrieve an array of all Storage Boxes currently stored within this mail system, including their maximum size, percentage full, number of floors to deliver to and identifier. For use in planning delivery routes.
        Specified by:
        retrieveSummaries in interface MailStorage
        Returns:
        Array of all summaries.

        public StorageBox deliverBox(java.lang.String identifer)

        Description copied from interface: MailStorage
        Retrieves a box by identifier for delivery by delivery bot. Will also notify anyone waiting on change in state to the event.

        Returns:
